Good point! ğŸ™Œ
â€¢Mad Stamp Co., Ltd. provides a quiet working environment.
You can work while appreciating your own monologue in a calm space.
You can spend some precious time on your own away from childcare and housework, even if just for a little while. ğŸ§˜â™€
â€¢Mad Stamp Co., Ltd. supports working mothers who value both childcare and work.
ğŸ’ª Our CX team is waiting for *** people with positive energy and outstanding capabilities. ğŸ’–
ğŸŒ¸ What kind of company is Mad Stamp Co., Ltd.? ğŸŒ¸
â€¢We are a company full of emotion that creates one-of-a-kind stamps in the world.
â€¢We are constantly challenging by combining stamp production technology and AI technology.
â€¢We support work-life balance through a family-friendly corporate culture (flexible work hours, telecommuting, etc.).
â£ Personality and attitude, why are they important?
â€¢Creating a positive atmosphere: Good character and a positive attitude play a big role in creating a fun and vibrant work environment.
â€¢Smooth communication: An attitude of mutual respect and consideration enables smooth communication with colleagues and helps form cooperative relationships.
â€¢Customer Satisfaction: The CX team is a department that communicates directly with customers. Good personality and positive attitude are important factors in giving customers trust and increasing satisfaction.
â€¢Company Values: Mad Stamp Co., Ltd. values â€‹â€‹a family-friendly corporate culture. We believe that positive synergy can be created by bringing together employees with good personality who respect and care for each other.
ğŸ“¢ We wait the talent who will grow together with good personality and positive attitude at Madstamp Co., Ltd.!
(*Discussion during salary interview)
